item.title: A Bond Selloff Is Rocking the World. You Might Want to Take the Other Side.
item.description: A rare ‘bear steepening’ trade is pressuring governments and worrying investors.

item.title: Judge Rules American Airlines Breached 401(k) Duties by Encouraging ESG Investing
item.description: The company’s retirement plan was found to favor socially conscious goals over financial returns.

item.title: The Top Stock Funds of 2024
item.description: The Magnificent Seven tech stocks and big AI players drove double-digit gains at many large-cap mutual funds. The top fund returned 51.8%.

item.title: Who Pays to Rebuild California When Insurance Falls Short? Everyone Else
item.description: Many Los Angeles-area residents devastated by fire will lean on Washington and charitable aid—and draw on their own savings.

item.title: SEC, Shift4 Payments Reach Disclosure-Violation Settlement
